message.body: Watching graduation procession and missing you!
Take the uptown/Queens-bound E (blue), then transfer to the uptown 6 (green).
Waiting for no. 6 and will hit send when I get off and start to walk:)
So, stopped and bought a sandwich on Lexington and bought an oatmeal cookie at Penn and still had almost am hour, so guess I know better for next time
Only one stop in NJ so a shorter trip. Only one stop left until Campbell Hall so will try to see grace
